author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

* Add `'.'` to Rivet paths so that reference files for new plugins can be given to CRAB jobs via `config.JobType.inputFiles`
* `putenv` did not seem to have an effect anymore, replaced with `setenv`

#### PR validation:

* Local references files are now correctly found
* CRAB workflow successfully tested by Louis: https://gitlab.cern.ch/cms-gen/Rivet/-/merge_requests/210#note_5524492
title: Set Rivet paths with setenv instead of putenv
